titlestmt.titleproper: A Guide to the Mrs. Charles T. Murphy photographs, Series 1060 FA100

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2022-03-01 00:24:31 -0500.
profiledesc.langusage: Description is written in: English, Latin script.

did.unittitle: Mrs. Charles T. Murphy photographs, Series 1060

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: The Rockefeller Foundation has title, copyright, and literary rights in the collection, in so far as it holds them. Rockefeller Archive Center has authority to grant permission to cite and publish archival material from the collection.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of postcards from around the world. Subjects include landscapes, buildings, churches and religious shrines, works of art, and people. Countries represented in the collection include: Austria, Burma (Myanmar), Canada, Ceylon (Sri Lanka), China, Egypt, England, France, Holland, India, Italy, Japan, Norway, Singapore, Spain, Sweden, Tibet, United States. The prints focus on the architecture of China, particular Beijing and Peking, including the Summer Palace and other temples.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Open for research. Brittle or damaged items are available at the discretion of RAC. Researchers interested in accessing digital media (floppy disks, CDs, DVDs, etc.) or audiovisual material (audio cassettes, VHS, etc.) in this collection must use an access surrogate. The original items may not be accessed because of preservation concerns. To request an access surrogate be made, or if you are unsure if there is an access surrogate, please contact an archivist.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Travel, Europe, Arts, Paintings, Sculpture, Architecture, Asia, America

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Beijing, Peking, China, Architecture, Gardens, Temples

did.unittitle: China - Beijing, Summer Palace, Temple of Azure Clouds, Temple of Heaven
